strings: <se_low>Yangus: It looks like a castle, but it ain't very big, eh?

<se_low>Yangus: An' it ain't in very good shape, neither.
Bit weird if you ask me.
<se_low>Yangus: (Sob!) Boo 'oo...

<se_low>Yangus: An ill father bein' supported by 'is daughter...
(Sob!) Those kinda stories always get me goin'...boo 'oo!
<se_high>Jessica: I heard about this castle from one of the sailors on the Port Prospect ferry.
<se_high>Jessica: An eccentric royal family is supposed to live here. He said they were reclusive collectors, but I haven't heard much about them recently.

<se_high>Jessica: Whatever it is they're doing, they seem to be working hard at it.
Maybe we should give them a hand!
<se_def>Angelo: It may be slightly the worse for wear, but at least it's not in as terrible a state as a certain cursed castle I know about!
<se_def>Angelo: ...Perhaps that wasn't the most sensitive thing I've said today!
<se_def>Angelo: That was quite the sob story.

<se_def>Angelo: But that Princess Minnie isn't bad, actually.
Brave, sweet and royal with it...
A man could do a lot worse than that.
<se_def>Angelo: I wonder how one would go about winning her affections...
<se_low>Yangus: Y'know, I think I've 'eard o' this place before!<page>Yangus: There was rumours in Pickham about a king somewhere who gives ya treasure if ya collect mini medals for 'im!
<se_low>Yangus: Crikey! I never thought I'd end up comin' to the Medal King's castle!
<se_low>Yangus: Hah! S'pose I should be callin' it the Medal Princess's castle now though, eh!?
<se_low>Yangus: I thought collectin' them mini medals would be a bit of a pain at first, but it's quite a laugh, innit!?

<se_low>Yangus: 'Specially when you've almost got enough for a bit o' treasure!
The excitement's a killer then!

<se_high>Jessica: So they're collecting mini medals.
But what are they planning to do with them once they have them?
<se_high>Jessica: I swear, I'll never understand the whole collector's mindset.
<se_high>Jessica: You know, everyone keeps praising the Princess for her hard work...<page>Jessica: ...but who's out there scouring every barrel, vase and cupboard to find the silly things? Us!

<se_high>Jessica: Whatever.
I shouldn't badmouth her.
I do want to help out!

<se_def>Angelo: Heh heh heh!
Looks like I've found a way into the Princess's heart!

<se_def>Angelo: Mini medals, you've answered my prayers!
I say we concentrate all our efforts on finding them from now on!
<se_def>Angelo: The delightful Princess Minnie will fall more and more deeply in love, with every mini medal I deliver! Heh heh heh!
<se_low>Yangus: I s'pose there ain't no point comin' 'ere now we've collected all the medals she wants.
<se_low>Yangus: Bit of a shame, really.
<se_high>Jessica: I can't imagine that our collecting all the mini medals is responsible, but the castle does seem more lively now, doesn't it?
<se_high>Jessica: I'm happy for them. It reminds me how great it'll be when the curse on Trodain Castle is finally lifted! Let's make it happen, guys!
<se_def>Angelo: I can't believe Princess Minnie hasn't fallen for me. Can't she see a good thing when it's staring her in the face!?
<se_def>Angelo: With that lack of judgement, no doubt it won't be long before the royal family goes to the dogs again.

<se_high>Jessica: Listen to you!
Sour grapes from a sore loser!
You weren't even in the running, Angelo.
<se_def>Angelo: I can't believe Princess Minnie hasn't fallen for me. Can't she see a good thing when it's staring her in the face!?
<se_def>Angelo: With that lack of judgement, no doubt it won't be long before the royal family goes to the dogs again.

<se_low>Yangus: We did it!
We pulled it off and got all them mini medals!

<se_low>Yangus: I feel like a properly obligated explorer now, I do!
Who'd 'ave thought we'd find so many of 'em!?

<se_high>Jessica: We got some nice rewards, and they were so happy to see the mini medals.
Talk about a happy ending for everyone!

<se_high>Jessica: We've done everything we can to help for now.
But I hope the Princess keeps on following her dreams!
<se_def>Angelo: ...Hm, that's weird!
<se_def>Angelo: Princess Minnie was supposed to come running into my arms when we finished collecting all those medals...
<se_high>Jessica: In your dreams, Romeo!
<se_high>Red: Yeah, a little castle on a desert island... I've 'eard about this place, ya know.
<se_high>Red: If I'm rememberin' right, there's some self-professed king livin' 'ere, an' 'is 'obby is collectin' treasure. Heh heh, now that's a royal pastime I can understand.
<se_high>Red: Gordon Bennett, this is all we need!
<se_high>Red: We ain't exactly got time on our 'ands at the minute, 'ave we, eh? I mean, I'm all for 'elpin' out mates...just so long as don't take forever.
<se_low>Morrie: A MAGNIFICO castello, ay? The decorazioni in gold, they are a meal for the eyes! But this island looks abbandonato. You think there is anyone home?
<se_low>Morrie: WOW! I have never heard such a moving tale before!
<se_low>Morrie: Va bene, we must give the admirable principessa a generous helping of hands, ay?
<se_high>Red: Come to think of it, I 'ave spotted a few little medals around the place when I've been 'untin' for treasure.
<se_high>Red: I never bothered to take 'em. They always looked pretty worthless to me.
<se_high>Red: Them little medals are all over the shop by the sound of it.
<se_high>Red: We can't afford to put ev'ryfin' else on 'old to go 'untin' them all out, can we? Nah, we'll just 'ave to look out for 'em as we carry on wiv wot we're s'posed to be doin'.
<se_low>Morrie: These mini medals the King is looking for, I do not have. But I have other medals. Special medals from my monstrous pit <endash> the MORRIE MEDAGLIE!
<se_low>Morrie: Ha ha, you like the sound of that, ay? You wanna get your hands on one, ay? You are chomping it to bits, AY?
<se_low>Morrie: Where are you, medals in miniature? Come, show your faces to me, ay? Come to padre!
<se_high>Red: Phew, we done it at last, eh? Even for an experienced treasure-'unter like meself, that was a long slog.
<se_high>Red: Still, the medal princess is 'appy now, so we can get back to focusin' on wot we're s'posed to be doin'.
<se_low>Morrie: Aaah, this feeling... I love it! I love it when the job is all done, ay!
<se_low>Morrie: Si, we had to work like the beavers, with GUSTO and PASSION and GRANDI denti, but now we have the satisfaction of knowing the work is finito.
<se_high>Red: That Minnie seems like she's got ev'ryfin' under control. I reckon we can safely leave 'er an' the King to it 'ere now.
<se_high>Red: I mean, don't anyone else think it's about time we got back to business wiv our quest, eh?
<se_low>Morrie: Now we have collected all of the mini medals, our work here is done. Something inside you feels sad, ay? ...Ha ha! Allora! I have the good news for you!
<se_low>Morrie: You see, while we have been collecting all the medals, I have been secretly hiding my own MORRIE MEDAGLIE all around the world!
<se_low>Morrie: So! Now we commence a new spanking quest, ay! To find the MORRIE MEDAGLIE <endash> the crown jewels of my pit!
<se_high>Red: Oh, yeah, 'ere ya go, Morrie. I've been meanin' to give these back to ya. I kept seein' ya droppin' 'em as we was goin' around the place. Lucky I got a sharp eye, eh?
<se_low>Morrie: Rosa Rossa! No, no no, I am not dropping these by errore, I...
<se_low>Morrie: .........Va bene. Congratulazioni! You have completed the MORRIE MEDAGLIE quest!
